title: client causes my screen to go blue then completely black during loading into game and game.
body: client works normally all the way up to champion select but then once it boots the second full screen window my screen goes blue and then black however the game is still running in the background and i can alt tab out of it to another window where my screen goes back to normal. this also happens when trying to launch a practice game.

replies.body: hey guys so i managed to work this one out. it seems that after a power outage my client settings went back to full screen. i  had to change my setting in game back to windowed mode and this resolved the issue. i was unable to do it on my PC tho as the screen was black so to work around this i used team viewer and remoted in to my PC and changed it that way. i hope this helps anyone that may have had a similar problem.
